data: While Doña Rosario effected her escape by the assistance of Curumilla, as recorded in the “Adventurers,” Don Tadeo was not long in regaining his senses.
While Doña Rosario effected her escape by the assistance of Curumilla, as recorded in the "Adventurers," Don Tadeo was not long in regaining his senses.
The Pearl of the Andes: A Tale of Love and Adventure
Aimard, Gustave, 1818-1883; St. John, Percy B. (Percy Bolingbroke), 1821-1889 [Editor]
